dcterms:description: The UA-Speech database contains dysarthric speech with different degrees of severity, consisting of utterances pronounced by individuals suffering from dysarthria. The dataset includes recordings of digits, computer commands, simple short words, complex long words, and the radio alphabet, recorded at 16 KHz with an array of 7 microphones.
dcterms:title: UA-Speech database
